rdf:Description.dc:title: A demographic overview of the Native populations in Alberta 1985
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Native Affairs Secretariat. Policy and Planning Branch.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Provides an overview of the demographic and social characteristics of the aboriginal populations of Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Indians of North America
